messages.text: Attention y'all! I just added the Commander to the group!
Welcome, Commander. Make yourself at home.
Whoa! The big cheese is here!
According to my analysis, I should raise my happiness index by 45.36%.
It's so nice to have you here, Commander!
Hey. Or whatever...
What a warm welcome. Thanks for adding me.
Now we can chat with Teacher... Yay! So nice!
You're finally here, honey!
Yo! Commander is in the house!
We should like totally throw a party to celebrate!
Hell yeah! Should we put on some movies in the theater?
Movie night? Count me in!
Watching movies together sounds great.
Love the sound of that. Let's get the whole chat in there!
Sounds like a plan. Then the next question is what kind of movie do we watch?
I want to see a movie about a prince and a princess!
A romance movie? I dig it. +1 to that.
If you ask me, a road trip movie :D
Yeah my vote goes to Cleve's idea.
Is there a movie about like some people collecting 7 stars to summon the Black Dragon to grant their wish?
What?
I've seen something like that before, but it's not a movie~
Huh... Guess we all got different movie tastes...
Coming to a decision isn't gonna be easy.
Let's hear what the Commander thinks.
Oh yeah, good idea. What do you wanna watch, Commander?

options.text: If we can't pick one or the other…

messages.text: Let's watch a romance movie.
Yay! Teacher is gonna watch a movie with me!
Heh, I knew we were on the same wavelength.
And it's fine if the movie gets just a little spicy.
Cause we grown-ups can handle a little spice heheh.
part2_mknm
At least TRY not to flirt in public...
Yeah yeah, I'll simmer down.
Boy, just the thought of watching a romance movie with my honey gets me excited!
A romance movie it is then. This will be great!
A road trip movie sounds good. Let's watch that.
Nothing like a comfy road trip to take your mind off things.
I know some good ones. I'll put together a list.
Me too. I'll DM you some of my favorites, Cleve.
A road trip movie it is then. This will be great!
Who's to say we can't watch everything we want?
We can watch multiple movies in one sitting, or screen them over several days.
Nice idea! That'll cast a wide net too, with at least one genre for everyone.
Then I wanna watch a horror movie! Like one where a bunch of nightmare fuel monsters jump out at you!
That's way too scary T^T
No horror...
I don't wanna watch that...
Let's not do any horror for the sake of the faint of heart.
If you want, we can have a separate screening showing only horror movies.
Nooo! My plan got vetoed out!
Yeah sorry you horror fans, maybe another time.
If anyone else has any suggestions, just leave em in the chat!
I'm gonna go and find some flicks!
Alright. I'll find a spot and work out a schedule.
I shall help you with that.
Aw yeah this is gonna be SO hype!
Commander, remember to be there!
Greetings, comrades, and welcome to our newly established group chat.
If you have any information to share, please post it here.
I have also added Comrade Commander to the group.
Let us all work together and shape the future of the port.
My dear comrade is already here?
Is that so? Oh, there. Welcome, dear comrade.
Excellent introduction, Comrade Soyuz. As expected of our leader.
Commander, welcome to the group~
Be mindful of what you send here. This is not yet another place for small talk.
Precisely. There will be no tongue and cheek banter or missed conducts.
Did you mean "tongue-in-cheek banter" and "misconducts"?
Yes, that.

options.text: That's what I like to hear.
There's no need to be so formal.

messages.text: That's the professionalism and discipline the Northern Parliament is known for. You love to see it.
Of course. Our code of conduct isn't just for the sake of appearances.
We work hard to earn and maintain your respect, Comrade.
Comrade Commander replied...
You've helped bring us all together, Comrade Commander, and that's wonderful.
I'm so happy.
Yeah me too!
In fact I'm so ecstatic I wanna celebrate! Let's booze up until the sun rises!
Like a welcoming party for the Commander and to commemorate this group chat? Sure!
I just bought a new game we can play too!
Oh and let's order some hot dogs and fried chicken to go with all those drinks.
Avrora, hook us up, will you?
Certainly. I'll fetch a few crates of vodka.
I'm in. I could use a drink after work.
Um... Where did all our professionalism and discipline go?
Well it's too late now...
We'll get our act together tomorrow instead!
Now who's ready to drink? Give me a "cheers"!
We don't have to take this THAT seriously. At the end of the day, it's a group chat.
Well, if that's how you see it...
Alright let's cut to the chase and drink the night away!
Right now? Just like that?
What, do you need to plan your binge drinking in advance? Sounds like a waste of time!
I'm with Gangut on this one. Let's throw a party to celebrate the chat's creation and welcome the Commander~
I just bought a new game we can play too!
Oh and let's order some hot dogs and fried chicken to go with all those drinks.
Avrora, hook us up, will you?
Certainly. I'll fetch a few crates of vodka.
Ahh vodka, my beloved...
Nothing tickles the throat better than you
Looks like Grozny is one bottle ahead of us.
Getting wasted sounds awesome right about now, actually.
EXACTLY! Come on let's meet up!
Now who's ready to drink? Give me a "cheers"!
Cheers!
Yes! Cheers!
Cheers!
HOLY RAVIOLI!
HOLY RAVIOLI!
What's the matter?
NO WAY!
How long have YOU been here, Commander?!
I just discovered a new channel and was gonna send something random, then I saw you were here!
Now, now, we only added the Commander a moment ago.
Commander, welcome to our group chat.
Yes, welcome.
Fu Shun! Show some respect and say welcome!
Fu Shun? Hello?
She's afk.
I think she went to see Bristol.
I'm really sorry about my sister, Commander.
Relax! The Commander doesn't mind something so small.
And if any disrespect WAS done I think a barbecue will make up for it!

options.text: Now that you mention it, it's lunchtime.

messages.text: Now that you mention it, it's lunchtime.
Her not replying isn't the end of the world. It's fine.
Phew! Good.
That's very gracious of you, Commander.
That aside, I like Harbin's idea of making barbecue.
It's been a while since we all ate with the Commander. Shall we get together and have lunch?
Did someone say lunch? Hell yeah!
Of course NOW you reply when there's food involved...
Lady Yuen is hungry! I need food!
i just finished making some baozi too, if anyone wants some.
Baozi, my delicious friend!
Get in my belly!
Oh, you're all going to cook lunch?
In that case, I'll handle dinner tonight.
Besides baozi and barbecue, is there anything you'd like, Commander?
I eat a lot, so I'll take an appetizer!
Sure! I'll get right on that.
Get me something light but tasty if you can!
Sure! I'll get right on that.
Make anything you want. You're the master cook here.
I'm flattered! I'll cook up something delicious for you.
make some space in the kitchen for me, lung! i'm gonna help!
Well, you know the saying about too many cooks...
If there aren't too many yet then allow me to help!
I've learned some new recipes and this is a great chance to show the Commander my skills.
Well, the thing is...
Yeah, I dunno...
What? What's wrong?
Chi An, would you care to join me for a game of go?
Right now?
Chi An, I just divined and your fortune for today is: "play with stones, not fire."
You didn't finish your previous game with her, did you? This is a good chance to settle the score.
Good point. If my fortune says so, then I'll play.
On another note, I just passed by the kitchen and noticed it was locked tight.
If Lung Wu is going to cook, maybe we should unlock it?
I'm sure she'll figure something out on her own...
Yeah she'll be fine!
I'm gonna make a FleetChat add-on gadget! I will dub it the Handy Dandy Notification Remindy!
Ooh cool! What does it do?
You know how the Commander joined our chat?
We only have push notifications and vibrate, so you'll still miss notices if you're not paying attention.
That's where my gadget comes in. You just link it to your account and set the Commander as a top priority follow, then you'll receive unique notifications! Problem solved.
See, if you don't check the notification within 30 seconds, your phone explodes! Knowing that, you'll never miss a message again.
Am I a genius or am I a genius?
part3_ykkj
I mean none of us want to miss a message from the Commander, right?
Your heart is in the right place, but blowing up phones is too dangerous.
What if it hurt the most radiant shipgirl in the world? By which I mean me.
yeah i don't want my phone to explode thx >.>
Just remove the explosion "feature" and check the notifs to easily find the commander's posts
Then you'd be cooking
Hmm, I see...
I'll come up with something to iron out the kinks. I'm off!
I suppose we're safe for now?
Probs. All she had to do was make something that sends you unique notifications.
Didn't they say they'll add priority follows as a basic feature to this app?
Yeah. Needing an add on gadget for that sounds like crap.

options.text: Yes, it would be pretty inconvenient.
Hey, girls. What are you talking about?

messages.text: I can't imagine using something like that on the regular.
Although, since there's no priority follow feature yet, that gadget WOULD be kind of useful.
Assuming it doesn't make anything explode, anyway.
Oh, the Commander is here.
yay it's the commander! my favorite person to chat with ^-^
Have no fear, Commander. Nothing will be exploding on my watch.
Hah! You've already failed as a leader the instant the Commander worries.
I'm much better suited to spread Sardegna's glory than you are!
I knew it...
You feel the same way?
Oh, no, I meant "I knew it" as in I knew the Commander was lurking in our chat.
How can you tell?
I saw it through my telescope.
That sounds creepy... Um I wasn't spying or anything.
I just happened to look in the office's direction.
Sounds like a telescope is way better than some exploding gadget for staying up to date with the Commander.
Now that you mention it...
Wouldn't being close to the Commander and reporting everything to the chat be the best way?
Just a thought...
I think that would be a bother to the Commander.
Right, yeah...
Guess all we can do is wait for da Vinci to finish her gadget.
Hey, girls. What are you talking about?
We were talking about setting you as a priority follow so we'll never miss your messages!
Oh, the Commander is here.
Welcome, and congratulations on your first message in this group chat.
Magnificent! On behalf of all of Sardegna, welcome!
hey commander ^.^
do you wanna play with me and little bunsalot?
Sure. Let's play.
How about we all gather and do something together?
For instance, a tea party?
Good idea... I'm hungry
Chop chop, Veneto! Prepare a tea party so the Commander can truly experience Sardegnian glory!
A tea party feels very plain. I say let's bathe in the thermae.
May I suggest a group book reading? I think that would be more fun.
i think it'd be nice to just chill out in a cool and dark place... hehehe...
Which of those would you like most, Commander?
They're all great ideas. I'm happy with doing anything as long as it's with all of you.
As you say. I'll arrange a party according to your schedule.
hooray! i love playing with you commander!
Then I'd better prepare some of the Commander's favorite dishes.
Commander, I sent you my plans via a DM. Please have a look.
I'm back! I thought about it and realized that explosions are art, so I'm keeping...
Whoa, that's a lot of unread messages...
Wait, the Commander was here?
Dang it! I missed those messages!
Why did nobody tell me to read the chat?!
I've been informed that our previous exercise has now been evaluated. The Commander is reviewing the results one last time.
Once that's done, the results will be announced in this group chat.
My child tailored that exercise to suit us.
Whatever the result may be, you should all reflect on it earnestly.

options.text: Hey. I'm here to announce the results.

messages.text: Hey. I'm here to announce the results.
But first, a small note on the personal scores. They will be sent to each participant via a DM.
I sense Dark Requiem drawing near! I must go and destroy them immediately!
You sure you're not just running from your problems?
Am NOT!
Don't be nervous. I have a good feeling about this exercise.
Except for that small mistake... Although that shouldn't affect our results that much.

options.text: You all got great results. However...

messages.text: You all got great results, except for a few of you.
no way im one of them.... ive been touching grass and practicing my ass off
If thusly fate has decided, there is naught to do but accept it!
But I trained so hard with Lord Bismarck!
I've got idol lessons to juggle as well so don't blame me if my results aren't perfect!
Did I study tactics before bed for nothing?
Did I stay awake the whole time for nothing?
Chill out. The Commander only said A FEW of us.
mandy please dont tell me i have to redo it...

options.text: You have nothing to worry about.

messages.text: You have nothing to worry about. You all passed.
Having said that, I noticed a few things that need some work. You'll want to focus on improving those.
On the whole, you all did great. You've earned some rest.
As the Commander said, the point of this exercise was not for you to meet some point threshold.
Its purpose was to make you aware of your shortcomings so you can correct them.
So THAT'S what you were talking about.
Explains why I just heard Z43 yell "hell yeah" then dragged Z47 and U-556 out to celebrate.
Okay...
Let her let loose. She must have been very anxious over the exercise.
You all got great results, and the results for the exercise as a whole were also great.
Having said that, I noticed a few things that need some work. You'll want to focus on improving those.
Just as I expected.
I had a feeling the premise for the exercise was too basic.
Think you can provide some more... exciting objectives next time?
Yes, it was laughably easy for this god of the sea.
If you want me to get serious, you'll have to provide a serious challenge.
It was a comprehensive exercise, and the Commander surely tailored the objectives to the average strength of our faction, not our best fighters.
My theory is that the goal was to identify our individual shortcomings. Simply raising the difficulty wouldn't be very productive in that case.
Correct. The end goal of the exercise was to improve your battlefield coordination.
I also hope you'll recognize your flaws and focus on correcting them in the future.
I certainly will be hitting the books later.
I'll try my best to eliminate my shortcomings before the next exercise!
Our scores weren't half bad this time but there's always something to improve!
Keep chasing that horizon!
Hmm, I see. You clearly work very hard on this, Commander.
And for your hard work, I'll give it my all in the next exercise.
As will I.
That concludes the review of our exercise.
Thank you to everyone who was here. You may rest now.
I performed tasseography earlier to determine our luck for the day.
Well? What kind of luck can we expect?
"Today is a very lucky day for you. This fortune shall be shared evenly amongst you all."
That's what it said.
Ooh I can't wait to find out how this luck will manifest!
I hope it's the kind of fortune that lets me clock out on time.
part3_ms
Leaving work on time is a pretty normal thing
TRUE fortune is getting to relax in your bed all day with an infinite supply of Dunkerque's pastries!
Fortuna does not smile upon the slothful!
You make your own luck by working hard day in and day out!
Just reading the words "working hard" makes me feel tired
Hehehehe... My lucky day...
So I can go nude and no one will tell me off AND I can expect a big fat reward from the Commander? Oh god yes ♥♥♥
All you should expect is to be judged for your deviancy.
Ladies, I hope you don't mind me cutting in.
I have invited the Commander to our group chat.
Perhaps this is what the divination meant? The pleasure of chatting with the Commander in our own group?
So it seems.
Thank you, divine Iris, for bringing the Commander into our chat.
Lord Commander! The Iris Orthodoxy's group chat welcomes thee!
Oh hey! Fancy seeing you, Commander.
Eepy, say something!
Right umm... I feel really lucky to get to chat with you...
Getting to chat with the Commander while on the job... I'm a lucky girl.
Dupleix? Slacking off? What is this, bizarro world?
look at you all yapping your mouths off.
how's the commander supposed to respond if you can't calm down for 2 seconds?

options.text: I can really feel the enthusiasm in here.

messages.text: Salut tout le monde.
Sorry, I was backreading so that's why I took so long to reply.
alright then... anyway welcome to our group chat.
Take your time catching up. We're not going anywhere.
Right, girls?
Mmmhh yeah you're so awesome Commander, love you ♥
This one concurs with Strasbourg. Chat interactions will furthermore reduce the risk of module overheating. Hopefully.

options.text: So, on the topic of luck...

messages.text: I saw you were talking about luck and fortune earlier.
I myself feel pretty fortunate for getting to participate in your group chat.
You know Commander, you should totally take off all your clothes and chat with me, it feels so much breezier that way, heheh...
It's my lucky day so you'll grant my little wish, won't you? ♥♥♥
dream on.
Well, I think we can all agree we're lucky to have the Commander here today.
How about we celebrate this wonderful occasion with a visit to the cat café?
Analysis: this suggestion is very sudden.
Gascogne is on standby in the event of suggestion implementation.
I agree with Richelieu. The question is, who's going to pick up the Commander?
clemenceau you dirty little... you're seriously gonna type that then smirk at me irl?
ugh... commander, i'm coming to your office.
Le Malin mentioned Dunkerque's pastries earlier and now I'm hungry.
Well, it just so happens I finished a batch. Come to the canteen if you'd like a bite.
Pastries make you happy, so they're the perfect thing to have on a lucky day.
Heck yeah! Dunkerque's pastries!
On my way!
Yes! The one thing that can tempt me to get out of bed!
Ahaha, I see her pastries are quite the crowd-pleaser.
I shall put on some tea. Anyone who doesn't have other business is welcome to join us.
Oh, it just hit me that it would be rather rude to ask the Commander to come here alone.
REQUESTING PERMISSION TO BE THE ESCORT!
Don't be silly Alsace, you're just gonna overheat again. Let ME be the escort and/or arm candy!
Ah, the center of attention as always.
Why don't you both go, hmm? I'm sure the Commander wouldn't turn you down.
Alright I did it. Is it working now?
Aye. It is live. I see your message.
I see it too! So what is this, a group chat? For fleetchat? Is the commander gonna be here?
Assuming I did everything correct, then aye, the Commander ought to be present.
I suppose some greetings are due. Welcome, Commander, to the Sakura Empire's group chat!
We scarcely rely on greetings, for the bond we've forged goes beyond such things.
Nay, what we rely on is...
Hm. The words escape me for the moment.
My mechanical ears?
My lovely tea?
Get real, both of you!
We all know that it's our katanas!
Yes, it would be pretty inconvenient.
I get what you mean, but saying you rely on your katana sounds like a threat...
Um... Is it the Dragon God's magnificence?
You're all wrong, nya.
It's my cheap and user-friendly products that bring us together, nya.
For the love of...
Even "it's our country's strength that connects us" sounds more plausible than "it's the stuff I'm peddling."
Agreed.
akagi making a good point is almost as rare as seeing a youkai
I'd keep my mouth shut if I were you.
so i was just scrolling by and... is akashi up in this place advertising?
if so don't mind if i paste this here!
Owari's Groceries – the freshest fruits and vegetables near you. Now accepting orders through FleetChat!
Well, I'm selling freshly squeezed milk if anyone's interested!
I offer fabrics and tailor-made Sakuran clothing for any and all occasions. Prices negotiable.
Stop it with the ads! This isn't a JuuTube video!
It'll tarnish our image if the Commander sees this!
Speaking of which, where be the Commander...?
The Commander is preoccupied with official business, likely with no room to read these messages.

options.text: Mine eyes have seen the Sakura Empire's strength!

messages.text: Mine eyes have seen the Sakura Empire's strength! It was glorious.
Your recognition means everything to us! We shall continue to put our all into our work, our battles, and even our group chat in the name of living up to your hopes.
I doubt it's necessary to put that much effort into writing text messages...
I assure you I can put more effort into sending messages to my Commander than anyone else here.
I'll singlehandedly make that unread message counter reach 999+!
That's called spamming and everyone hates it! And don't even think about hogging the Commander's attention! It belongs to me!
Both of you, please don't let your enthusiasm become a burden on the Commander.
I appreciate your energy. Don't be afraid to message me. It doesn't bother me whatsoever.
I'll reply to you as soon as I have the time.
Great, but prioritize your work.
Are you still working, Commander?
If so, it is only natural that we offer help.
That is true. The quicker the work is done, the more time the Commander has to chat with us.
Should there be anything we can assist with, please do let us know.
Selling things, are we? Alright, I'll bite. Any recommendations?
Personally, I'd recommend the milk. My pet bunnies love it.
Do you think your bunnies would come to me if offered some of it?
I think so. They should be comfortable with you... probably.
In that case I'll have 2 crates please.
Thank you for your purchase!
You should give Owari's homegrown veggies a try! They make anything taste super duper good
Ain't that the truth! It's like magic I tell you!
i'd recommend watarase's tailoring service. her clothes fit really well
oh akagi speaking of which, you should think about ordering some from her
she's perfect for busy women like you who don't have the time to keep up with fashion trends or update their wardrobe ever
What. Did. You. Just. Say?
I might just order some tailor-made clothes.
If it's clothing you want, you should buy my VIP membership, nya!
I can tailor-make clothes too for my VIPs, among many other things, nya!
Be not so overbearing, Akashi. I doubt the Commander needs such a thing.
I see the Commander has answered with silence. A wise response.
Nya?
Attention, my loyal subjects! My servant just accepted my invitation.
I demand a welcoming tea party posthaste. Get to work, all of you!
Understood, Your Majesty.
We shall arrange all the necessities for a tea party at once.
The task list of each Royal Maid shall be posted in this group at a later point.
Then I shall bring out my finest tea leaves for us all to enjoy.
I baked some cookies, so I'll be sure to bring those.
Oh, you've already decided on a tea party?
Well alright...
You should join us, Indomitable. The Commander will be there.
Yeah! Also let's do away with tradition... let's host an ~innovative~ tea party for my owner |ωΦ)ฅ
Innovative, you say? What do you have in mind?
Hosting it at night instead of the day, and having some fireworks and a magic show!
Those are just my ideas though! Any other suggestions? :3
All ideas are welcome! Let's hear them now!
How about a menu featuring regional dishes? We could combine scouse with some eel...
we could also NOT throw food straight in the bin
Why not spice it up with some different uniforms for the maids?
I've heard serving in a swimsuit is the popular thing nowadays!
What? First time I've ever heard of it...
Rejected.
Yes, that feels a bit inappropriate.
Perhaps we could do it in the style of a buffet? Then you could chat and get biscuits at your own pace.
I like that idea!
I see you have eyes on the chat...
Let me clarify that it wouldn't be a no-holds-barred ordeal, just slightly more casual.
While it is typically the Royal Maids' duty to prepare the tea, perhaps the Royal Knights could do the honours this time.
Really? Are you certain?
If we're doing that, I promise to do my best!
An interesting proposal, to be sure.
I consider myself a capable cook. I will handle the food.
What do we say to inviting all the little destroyers?
Seeing them all in one place, participating in the tea party – would be pretty unique, no?
Which of those would you like most, Commander?
I permit you to state your opinion! After all, this tea party is meant for you.

options.text: I'd like a traditional tea party.
Let's get innovative with this tea party.

messages.text: I'd like a traditional tea party.
You only have so much time to prepare everything. Let's save the good ideas for another time.
As you wish, Master.
The Royal Maids shall begin to organise the tea party now.
Please allow me to help with the preparations!
Another tea party with big brother! Yuni and I are so happy!
It feels like it's been a while since the Commander could join us at one. I can hardly wait for it.
You brought up so many good ideas that I think would be great for this tea party.
I knew you'd prefer new and novel things ^ω^
As you wish, Master.
The Royal Maids shall begin to organise a new and novel tea party based on the suggestions given above.
We shall spare no effort to make it live up to your hopes, Master.
And I'm going to learn some new tea party culture.
This will be great! I'm gonna take so many pics!
Hang on, I'll go get the scouse and eel!
Very well. I shall make some donuts in all manner of flavours.
I think you will agree that the bonito-flavoured ones are very novel.
Lovely. I'll put on tea.
Umm...
Could we at least keep the food within the realm of traditional? Please?
Decided on a direction for the tea party? Good!
Considering how many suggestions alone there were, I suspect this is going to be quite a large gathering.
Bel, forget a tea party, this is going to be a banquet!
Understood, Your Majesty.
Tempesta, shout if you're here!
Yeah yeah. I'm here.
What is it? Are we going on another journey?
You could say that.
You lot heard the news?
What news?
god u type soooo slow! spit it out!!!
Word on the street is there's treasure in the Commander's office! We should go treasure hunting in there!
In the office? Seriously?
It's a pretty small place. There isn't much room to hide treasure.
Yeah... I know the office inside out
I'm pretty sure there's no treasure there
This is the first I've heard of any supposed treasure in my office.
So the Commander knows nothing about it. Sounds like fake news then~
ooor its hidden so well even the commander hasnt caught on
That is a non-zero possibility.
Well, Occam's razor says it's just a baseless rumor.
There's only one way to find out if it's true or not: going there and seeing for ourselves!

options.text: You're free to come, but just so you know...
I'll help you look for it.

messages.text: Is this another adventure game?
If so, count me in.
game? what game?
Look, Whydah graces us with her presence for once.
Oh Commander, you sure love keeping us in suspense~
Now I'm REALLY curious! My treasure sense is tingling, and it's pointing toward the office!
Let's head there and get searching!

options.text: You're free to come, but just so you know...
I'll help you look for it.

messages.text: You're free to come, but just so you know, I doubt there's any treasure.
It's my office, so I of all people should know what's in here!
I think we should refrain from disturbing the Commander.
Agreed. We can't let our fun come at the cost of the Commander's concentration.
Come on! You're not all just gonna give up like that, are you?
I have an idea: first, we help finish the Commander's work for the day.
Once that's done, we can look around without disturbing anyone.
Ooh, that's not a bad idea!
So it shall be! Let us assist with the Commander's work!
ugghh... what a pain... miss me with that
im off to buy some booze! no idea when ill be back
And the rest of you?
Hellooo? Why are you all ghosting me now?
Perhaps they switched off their phones to help the Commander, hmm?
I'll help you look for it.
You've made me curious. I wanna see what treasure lies in my office.
Ohh, so you'll join us~ In that case, count me in!
Sweet! With your help, we're BOUND to find some treasure!
want me to fetch some tools? like a compass or shovel or smth
It's an office. We don't need to go digging.
save yourselves the pain, honestly...
just bring dolphin. she'll find the treasure in half a second with that ability of hers
Me? I'm already at the office
I can't detect any treasure
Well, not any literal treasure. I do detect the Commander though
So true~
I mean, sure, the Commander IS a treasure! Not denying that.
I'm talking about gold and doubloons, though! We'll all have to search to find that!
Now come on, you lot! Meet me at the office!
Hey girls, I've got an idea!
The Commander's gonna join the chat, but before that, let's prepare a little surprise (*´з`)
What kind of surprise?
Haven't thought of that yet... I was hoping you all could come up with some suggestions (/・ω・)/
Hmm...
Oh me me! I've got a good one!
Let's make our chat icon the group photo we took with the Commander! Feels fitting doesn't it?
that pic is huge. we're not all gonna fit in the icon.
And if we shrink it it'll look super blurry!
Yeah... Does anyone else have an idea?
Okay, how about a present then?
A little welcome gift for joining our chat ヽ(^。^)ノ
Yes, like a dessert.
Then it has to be something very sweet.
Yeah. The Commander would love that.
...Is that so?
I see! Good characterization is when you say your catchphrase even in text chats!
LOL
Getting back on topic... Are there any other ideas?
I've got one!
You could dip your pastry in soy sauce!
Or have it with wasabi or chili peppers!
Uh... I'm not sure what good that will do.
Fu Shun! They're talking about how to surprise the Commander, not how to eat dim sum!
Also, that's really out there even for you!
I've heard people eat it like that in some regions.
Oh wait, we're getting off topic! Sorry.
So you still haven't realized...
Realized what?
The Commander is ALREADY here.
I saw the notif when I woke up...
Oh shoot! It got buried among all the other messages so I missed it!
Commander, say something!

options.text: I didn't want to butt in…

messages.text: Hi! It's me.
Good timing! We were just talking about preparing a surprise for you.
Shush! You'll ruin the surprise at this rate!
I'm pretty sure you can read the chat history after you join a group, sooo...
Uh oh the jig is up! It's not a surprise anymore Σ(･ω･ﾉ)ﾉ！
It's the thought that counts.
Your thoughts are the greatest surprise I could ask for.
YOU'RE the best I could ask for! You're awesome ♥
Well even if it's not a surprise anymore I still wanna give you a gift (*^-^*)
Same.
Yes, same.
Okay, I'll compile a list of potential gifts and we can decide on it together.
Please DM me if you come up with any ideas.
You were having so much fun talking among yourselves and I didn't want to butt in.
It's the thought that counts.
Oh the Commander IS here! Guess the cat is out of the bag then huh...
You can hardly call it a surprise anymore.
Yes, that's true.
Well even if it's not a surprise now who's to say we still can't prepare a gift, right?
Yeah. We can still do that.
So Commander, what kind of present would you like? ('ω')

options.text: Your kindness is the best present I could ask for.

messages.text: Your kindness is the best present I could ask for.
Not to be rude, but that's a cop-out...
YOU'RE the best I could ask for! You're awesome ♥
Gang, let's figure out a non-surprising gift to give the Commander!
Yeah. We can still do that.
Okay, I'll compile a list of potential gifts and we can decide on it together.
Please DM me if you come up with any ideas.
commander... can i take the day off?
head's all fuzzy. no energy to do anything...

options.text: Did you get sick or something?
Did you pull an all-nighter grinding that game?
Are secretary duties too much of a hassle for you?

messages.text: Did you get sick or something?
I'll come bring you some pudding and medicine.
uhh... you don't need to go out of your way to do that...
i think i'll be good if i just play some games and take a nap
so yeah, don't come all the way out here just for me

options.text: I see, I see. Enjoy your gaming session.
Actually, I'm still a bit concerned about you…

messages.text: I see, I see. Enjoy your gaming session.
i
zzz... fine, it's not worth the effort trying to keep the lies straight
a new game just came out, and i wanna finish it asap
so, commander, mind doing me a solid?
Well, things aren't too busy around here, so go ahead and enjoy your day off.
thx, commander. you're the best
you really do know how to rack up a girl's affection points
No can do. Nobody's lazing around on MY watch!
ehhhhh... meanie
but, i guess it's my fault to begin with...
and i kinda do feel bad about it
well, whatever. an order's an order
i guess if i have to...
alright, i'll be right over...
Actually, I'm still a bit concerned about you...
...are you like this with everyone?
but, i appreciate it
oh yeah, if you're gonna come anyway, mind grabbing me some bbq crisps?
Did you pull an all-nighter grinding that game?
...yeah
whenever a new game comes out, i just wanna power through it in a single sitting
but now, my head feels like it's gonna explode...
I'll approve your request for a temporary leave, so go take some time off and rest up.
I'll approve your request for a temporary leave, so go take some time off and rest up.
Next time, just take the day off instead of pulling an all-nighter.
alright...
i'm really gonna take you up on that, you know?
now then, back to the grind...
huh? how do i cancel this again...
Are secretary duties too much of a hassle for you?
wait, no, that's not what i meant...
it's just that... all work in general is kinda hard
especially when compared to a soft pillow and a warm bed
siiiiigh... i really don't wanna have to work...
Well, things aren't too busy around here, so go ahead and enjoy your day off.
thx, commander. you're the best
you really do know how to rack up a girl's affection points
Sorry, we don't do work-from-home here. You can bring your pillow and blanket though!
ehhhhh... meanie
but, i guess it's my fault to begin with...
and i kinda do feel bad about it
well, whatever. an order's an order
i guess if i have to...
but, i'll leave the sleep gear at home. i'll just use yours instead
alright, i'll be right over...
commander, it's raining...

options.text: Ah, you're right. It is raining.

messages.text: You're not scared, are you?
nah, not of a little drizzle like this, anyway...
i'm just a little worried that the sun might not come out tomorrow...
Ah, you're right. It is raining.
I sure hope we don't get rained out tomorrow, though...
yeah, me too...
we had plans and all, so if it ends up raining...
we're not gonna have a very good time

options.text: Hopefully things clear up by then.
It's gonna be rainbows and sunshine tomorrow, I know it.

messages.text: Hopefully things clear up by then.
We finally managed to schedule an outing together, so it'd be a shame to have to push that back because of the weather.
"finally"? i'm not some kind of elusive, mythical beast...
i know i'm not the outdoorsy time, but if it's just the two of us...
it's not like i spent two days thinking about it and then another half day rolling around indecisively or anything...
i
oh, i heard thunder...

options.text: I'll be over there in a sec!
Can you drown it out by playing games with your headphones on?

messages.text: Don't worry, I'll be over there in a sec!
i already told you, i'm fine
well, maybe i'm a little scared...
please come soon
Can you drown it out by playing games with your headphones on?
i guess that might work for a bit...
yeah, right... it's not working...
maybe it'll work better if you hop online for some co-op?
if we play some games together, maybe that'll take my mind off the thunder outside...
yeah, that might just work... hurry up and log on, ok? i'll be waiting
It's gonna be rainbows and sunshine tomorrow, I know it.
you sound pretty confident, commander...
what if you end up being wrong though?

options.text: Then, we'll just go on a rainy day stroll!
Let's blast the rainclouds away with overwhelming firepower.

messages.text: Then, we'll just go on a rainy day stroll!
There's a certain charm to it, wouldn't you agree? Plus, certain things look even prettier in the rain.
but then you'd have to carry an umbrella... isn't that tiresome?
then again, you never seem to find anything tiresome, huh?
you even go out of your way to look after me...
when i think about it from that perspective, maybe a rainy day stroll isn't such a bad idea after all...
though... i still do hope the sun comes out...
Let's blast the rainclouds away with overwhelming firepower.
Come again?
Sorry, bad joke. We can fire a few rockets up to seed the clouds and make the rain come down sooner, though.
you really come up with the craziest stuff, commander...
do you really want to take me on an outing that badly?
We'll be going TOGETHER. Key word there.
I'll go get the stuff ready. Hope you're ready too, Whydah.
yeah... i'll see you tomorrow morning...
sigh... i woke up all early, and you're not even here...

options.text: I'm picking some stuff up from the store first.
I'm out shopping right now. Be back in a jiffy.

messages.text: I'm picking some stuff up from the store first.
huh? what are you buying?
pick me up some crisps while you're there? the same ones as before~

options.text: Got it. Anything else you want?
Speaking of food, I'm kinda hungry myself.

messages.text: I'm out shopping right now. Be back in a jiffy.
huh, i see... well, take your time. no rush here on my end.
wait, say what? you're shopping?
i want some crisps!
grab me some while you're there, yeah?

options.text: Got it. Anything else you want?
Speaking of food, I'm kinda hungry myself.

messages.text: Got it. Anything else you want?
you.
hurry up and come back already...
when i woke up, you weren't there with me... didn't like how that felt
i wanna see you soon...
Speaking of food, I'm kinda hungry myself.
just grab a family-size pack then. we can share
and once you're done, hurry up and come back already
i'm getting hungry. and also...
i miss you
Hey Commander, I read a travel guide and saw some ancient ruins I want to explore!
Do you want to come with me on a mini-trip?

options.text: I'll need to think about it.

messages.text: Sure! Let's go!
Great! Also I've created a tour schedule so I'm ready to set off whenever you are.

options.text: Let me just pack some stuff.

messages.text: Is there anything I should pack for the journey?
Nothing in particular. You don't need to overthink it.
In the event you need something, you can just buy it when we're there.

options.text: Thanks for being such a good travel buddy.
Let me just pack some stuff real quick.

messages.text: Thanks for being such a good travel buddy.
Of course! I strive to give you the best experience possible.
I'll take your answer as a yes. I'll be over there in a few minutes.
Let me just pack some stuff real quick.
Absolutely. Let me know when you're done.
I'll be there in a few minutes!
I'm so excited to go on my first trip with you!
I'll need to think about it.
Oh, are you busy with work? Or is something else on your mind?

options.text: Sadly, I have tons of work to do.
I'd prefer to relax at home.
I'd rather stay home and play games.

messages.text: Sadly, I have tons of work to do.
I could help you with that then.
Once your work is all finished, then there's nothing stopping you!
I'm heading to your office right now!
My vacations are few and far between, so ideally, I'd rest up at home.
Hmm... You do work really hard so maybe staying home and getting a good rest is for the better.
Let's do it another time then! We'll go on this trip when you feel ready for it.
I'd rather stay home and play games.
Games? As in video games?
I've never played one, but I've heard they're quite fun.
Do you think you could teach me how to play?

options.text: Sure thing! It's easy to pick up.
I'd be happy to play with you.

messages.text: Sure thing! It's easy to pick up.
I'd be happy to play with you.
Alright, I'll drop by your place soon!
Oh also I'm going to make some spiced tea for you. Just give me a minute!
Commander, when is your work done?
I'm asking because I've made dinner for you!
I changed the amount of spice this time and I think you're going to love it.

options.text: I'm working overtime tonight. Can you bring it to me?
Come to think of it, it's time for my dinner break.

messages.text: I'm working overtime tonight. Can you bring it to me?
Take-away it is! I'll be right there soon.

options.text: I can smell it from here.
The work can wait. I need to eat.

messages.text: I can smell it from here.
But it hasn't even left the kitchen yet.
You must be really hungry... or you must really miss me!
At any rate, just hold on for another 10 minutes. I'll be there as soon as I can.
The work can wait. I need to eat.
That's the spirit! You can't work on an empty stomach after all.
I can even help with your work after you're done eating.
Then once your work is done, we can get up to some much more fun things!
Come to think of it, it's time for my dinner break.
I'll come to you instead. Be right there.
Sure! I'll find a seat for us in the canteen.
Um... it looks like every seat is taken.
How about I bring the food somewhere else?
Like for instance, to my room. I'll meet you there!
Do you want to watch the sunrise with me?

options.text: Why the sudden interest in the sunrise?
Sure. Let's watch the sunrise together tomorrow!

messages.text: Why the sudden interest in the sunrise?
Well people have told me the sunrise at the port is to die for, but I've never seen it since I arrived here.
The realisation hit me just earlier so I thought I'd ask if you want to see it as well.
You may be disappointed. Our sunrise isn't as special as you think.
I'm sure it pales in comparison to the many amazing things you've seen.
Perhaps... but I believe seeing it with you is what makes it special.
Everything is better with you and I'm sure a sunrise is no different!

options.text: Alright then. Let's watch the sunrise!
Everything is better with you, too.

messages.text: Alright then. Let's watch the sunrise!
Wonderful!
Then I'll meet you at the pier early tomorrow morning!
You have a point. Everything is better when I'm with you, too.
Let's do it. We'll watch the sunrise tomorrow!
Aww I'm so glad to hear that!
Let's meet at the pier early tomorrow morning then.
Sure. I'm up for that. I haven't seen the sunrise in a while, come to think of it.
You'd better go to bed early today then.
You'll need your beauty sleep or you'll wake up feeling groggy!
You know, there's another way to ensure I don't oversleep...
Out of the question!
Haha! Fine, I'll just go to bed early.
Sure. Let's watch the sunrise together tomorrow!
Wonderful!
Also don't forget to set your alarm clock early.
You don't want to oversleep and miss it!

options.text: Don't worry, I'll be up on time.
I know something better than setting an alarm…

messages.text: Don't worry, I'll be up on time.
Good! I trust you.
Gosh I'm so excited to get to do this with you!
Let's meet at the pier early tomorrow morning!
I know something better than setting an alarm...
OR you could come and give me a wake-up call. How about that?
Wake-up call?
I can certainly do that! I just didn't think you'd want that.
I'll be at your quarters tomorrow to personally bid you good morning!
See you then <3
Do you remember the shower gel you suggested to me the other day?
I tried it and I liked it. It tasted pretty good.
Glad to hear it. I knew you'd like it.
Yes. Now I smell just like you do.
Not just my body, but every strand of hair as well.
Your... hair?
You used it on your hair?
Was I not supposed to?
I thought hair was a part of the body.

options.text: You're supposed to use shower gel on your body…

messages.text: Technically, yes, but you're supposed to use shower gel on your body and shampoo on your hair.
I see... The functions of each are slightly different.
Thanks. I'll bear that in mind.
You TASTED it?
You TASTED it?
It had the same smell as you do, so I couldn't help myself.

options.text: You're NOT supposed to eat that!

messages.text: Do you feel ill?
Rest assured, nothing bad came of it.
It's a trifle compared to the hunger and thirst I feel toward you.
You're NOT supposed to eat that!
Rest assured, nothing bad came of it.
But, since you're assertive about this, I'll try to suppress my hunger next time.
I had Dragon Empery-style spicy fish for lunch earlier today.
And later I had Iris Orthodoxy dessert.
They each had a unique taste to them.
Still, they're nothing compared to the taste of you.

options.text: Don't eat me! There are better foods out there!

messages.text: Sorry, what? Am I food to you?
Good friends make good food!
Not like THAT! Who taught you that?
Haha. Are you scared?
Don't be. Of course I don't see you as food.
While I love the way you taste, I would never devour you.
I simply think about you whenever I consume by myself.
Perhaps this is hunger, or perhaps it's some other feeling... I'm not sure myself.
Having said that, maybe consuming together with you could placate my cravings.

options.text: I'll take you to a good restaurant tomorrow.

messages.text: Don't eat me! There are better foods out there!
But...
Good friends make good food!
Not like THAT! Who taught you that?
Haha. Are you scared?
Don't be. Of course I don't see you as food.
Speaking of food, though, what are your favourite dishes?
Let me think...
I sent you a list of some I like.
Thank you.
That's quite a lot. Where can I eat these?

options.text: I'll take you to a good restaurant tomorrow.

messages.text: I'll take you to a good restaurant tomorrow.
This need not wait until tomorrow. We can go now. I'm still very, very hungry.
Besides, I would really like to be with you right now.
Let us consume. Together.
There are two birds chirping incessantly outside my window.
I thought about devouring them, but then I realised that someone might like their chirping.
So I decided not to.

options.text: Someone like me. I like their chirping.

messages.text: Ah, you've grasped what "like" means.
Yes.
It's akin to how I like you.
I put myself in another's shoes, as they say, and understood that I'd feel sad if someone ate you.
You've also grasped what "sad" means!
Don't worry. Nobody's ever going to eat me.
They won't. Not as long as I'm here.
No one will take you from me.
Someone like me. I like their chirping.
I had a feeling you did.
I once saw you looking out the window at some birds and smiling.
Is that what "liking" is?

options.text: Yeah. That's when you like someone or something.

messages.text: Yeah. That's when you like someone or something.
Then I will always look at you.
I find myself smiling every time we chat.
This is an expression of my liking for you.
I wouldn't have grasped small things like this if it weren't for you.
I'm truly blessed to have met you, Commander.
Say, do you have any hobbies?
Quite a few.
Kindly tell me one, then. I just want to get to know you better.
I like to read.
Hmm. A good hobby, I'll admit.
Reading lets you tap into so much knowledge from the comfort of your own room.
On that note, what books would you recommend to me?

options.text: I'll pick out a few and bring them to you.

messages.text: Give me a minute and I'll be back to you with a list.
Be right there. I'll pick some books and bring them to you.
Oh, that's very kind of you.
Once I'm done reading them, let's share our thoughts on each one, shall we?
I like video games.
Ah, yes, video games! An extremely addictive marvel of modern technology.
Since you're a gamer, what are your recommendations?

options.text: I'll link you some of my favorites.
What do you say we play a co-op game together?

messages.text: I'll link you some of my favorites.
Great! I'll start by playing some of those, then.
I have no doubt that any game you'd recommend is fun.
I'll let you know what I thought about them when I'm done.
What do you say we play a co-op game together?
Sounds good! I've never played one of those before.
It sounds like a lot of fun.
I'll head over there now, so just wait a bit.
I love my job!
Wow... Somehow I'm not surprised, reading those words from you.
Being a hard worker is fine and all, just remember to take breaks so you don't burn yourself out.
Perhaps you could say that chatting with me is kind of like a break, hmm?
That gives me an idea. I'll message you every day from now on to make sure you're taking breaks.
Why do you ask?
Why not? I'm eager to get to know you better.
Starting with an easy subject like hobbies facilitates a smooth conversation.

options.text: You don't have to be so formal about it.
Okay, then what are YOUR hobbies?

messages.text: There's no need for such a diplomatic approach.
We'll find common ground just by talking normally.
Ah, I see. You like to take it nice and slow with these things.
I get it. Let's just have a chat, then.
I have an idea for a topic: your first impression of me.
How do you feel about me, hmm?
Okay, then what are YOUR hobbies?
MY hobbies? Treasure hunting, I suppose.
Diving deep into uncharted waters, finding forgotten treasure... it's all quite fun.
Say, are you keen on treasure hunting?
A bit.
Then we should certainly go treasure hunting together sometime.
By "sometime" I mean "how about right now?"
Depends on the treasure.
I only have eyes for exceedingly valuable treasure, if that's what you're hinting at.
I'm certain you'd like it as well.
But as they say: show, don't tell. Why don't you have a look at my collection?
I'm heading to your office with a meal for you.
What do you think I'm bringing?

options.text: Grilled meat, fried chicken, and soda?

messages.text: Grilled meat, fried chicken, and soda?
Correct.
I can tell you really like this stuff.
You gorged yourself on it yesterday when we had supper together.

options.text: Who can say no to good food?

messages.text: Calorie-rich food makes you happy.
Who can say no to good food?
Especially as a treat after you've worked hard all day.
Well, you should eat as much as you want then!
I'm at the door now. Could you come open it? This stuff is rather heavy.
I'll take anything! I'm starving!
Oh, really? It's a good thing I bought a lot of food, then.
I have grilled meat, fried chicken, and soda.
You love that stuff, don't you?

options.text: Anything's good as long as it fills me up!

messages.text: Holy moly! Yes!
Nobody can resist those delicious dishes!
Good to hear! Bon appetit.
I'll take anything! I'm starving!
Again with the "I'll eat anything"... Do you mind if I eat with you?
Go right ahead. Heck, eating with you would be fun.
Fun, you say?
It sounds like you enjoy being in my company.
Well, be with you I shall, then! And we'll enjoy a whole feast together.
I'm at the door now. Could you come open it? This stuff is rather heavy.
It's been 3 days since I left now. Do you miss me yet?
Waiting for your reply!
I do!
I miss you too!
I think about you every second of every day.
I miss you, but I'll survive. Chatting like this every day helps.
Fair enough. It's not enough for me, though.
I still miss you a lot, even if we do chat every day.
Hey, go to the window and look outside.
There's nothing there.
Am I missing something?
What, were you hoping to see me or something?

options.text: Another one of your pranks, huh?

messages.text: Another one of your pranks, huh?
Caught me red-handed!
In all seriousness, this isn't the setup for a prank.
I just wanted to tell you...
Oh, you're back?
Ahaha, maybe I am. Why don't you check?
I just did. I couldn't find you.
Heheh, sorry but I can't come home right this moment.
All you'll see out the window are the stars in the night sky.
But, you know...
We're both gazing at the same sky now, watching the same stars.
In a way, isn't it like we're both here, together?
I tell myself that so I can cope with the longing at least a little longer.
As soon as I finish my business, I'm heading right back to your side.
Wait for me until then!
do u want a foot pressure back massage?

options.text: As in, you're going to step on me?

messages.text: As in, you're going to step on me?
By who? You?
well duh!!! who else did u think?
all u gotta do is lie down n ill treat u to a 1st rate massage

options.text: Why are you offering me this out of the blue?
Okay! I'll be waiting here, on my stomach.

messages.text: Why are you offering me this out of the blue?
uhh cos u look like work has been bustin ur ass?
foot pressure massages feel like really good ive heard, add my miracle remedy to that n ur gonna forget u were ever tired
Speaking of work... have you finished yours for the day?
i
yeah OBVIOUSLY i finished my work!!!
wow SOMEONE has nothing but work on their brain
go get yourself showered n ill do the same then get over there!
Okay! I'll be waiting here, on my stomach.
good! just stay like that!
foot pressure massages feel like really good ive heard, add my miracle remedy to that n ur gonna forget u were ever tired
which i bet u are cos uve been working pretty hard rite?

options.text: I wouldn't be tired if you'd pull your own weight…

messages.text: I wouldn't be tired if you'd pull your own weight...
ugghh come ooon cut me a break!!
yeah i cant do office work worth a damn but at least lemme make u feel good
go get yourself showered n ill do the same then get over there!
actually u know what im gonna borrow ur shower rq!
hang on a bit!
like its embarrassing to admit so i ate this stuff hey whats up just woke up after
Come again?
What are you trying to say?
wut? u messaged me?
You messaged me first.
did i- OH ur rite lol
Have you been drinking?
no?
That's what every drinker says. I'm coming to check on you.
i JUST told u i havent been drinking!!!!!
but if u wanna come then yeah go for it! lets get wasted buddy!
and look at the stars!
Have you been drinking?
no?
but wanna come over n drink together?
ill be out on the lawn waitin for u!!

options.text: I'll bring some tea to sober you up.

messages.text: Alright. On my way.
sweettt, waitin for u
I'll bring some tea to sober you up.
ew sounds gross...
just come here, no need to bring anything......
just wanna drink with u.... and look at the stars
ohhh boy im seeing SO many stars!! all around me!!!
go lil stars hehe... spin round the commander!
u feel like workin out with me?

options.text: Too tired. Can't. You'll have to do it solo.

messages.text: Sure. Why are you asking all of a sudden, though?
cos i wanna get stronger legs!
life at this port is sooo laid back i get no chances for any kind of exercise
muscles are gonna turn to mush if i dont do somethin
you like how i am now rite? u know like not all mushy
I'll always like you.
wowww... we got a smooth talker here...
same, ill always like u no matter how u change
still! i cant slack off forever!!!
You're great, work ethic aside...
wow seriously? i though we were having a moment then u start talkin about work
u know what my job is? givin u some good ass back massages!
thats one thing im never gonna slack on!!!
so i gotta keep my legs in peak shape
the better my legs are the better the massages u gonna get!
anyway im off to work out, send me a text when u get here!
Too tired. Can't. You'll have to do it solo.
cmon maaan dont be lazy!
i need u here so i can perform at 110%!!
I'll be there in spirit!
guess ill take it! spiritually!
if nothin else its still making me feel motivated
hey i just came up with a way to exercise without hitting the gym
And what would that be?
guess!
times up! im omw there! get washed and wait in bed! ull see what i mean soon
Commander
Hey Commander!
Did you get my message?
If you did then please say something!
This is the Commander. Copy that. Over.
Good! My message went through
Something!
Hehe, well you did say something at least
This "smart phone" thing is really convenient for sending messages
It lets me talk to you whenever I want, even if you're far away
My special ability pales in comparison to that!
That's not all. It can send stamps in addition to messages.
Stamps? What do you mean?
part2_aks3
Oh, it's the green kitty!
naerxun
Wow! She looks imposing!
part3_lp
Cute hehe
So that's what a stamp is, I see
Do you think they'll make a stamp of me next?
You can make your own.
"Make your own"?
You mean I can turn my own expression into a stamp?
That sounds fun! How do you do that?

options.text: Well, do you have a minute?

messages.text: Well, do you have a minute?
Yeah, I have time
Where are you now?
Never mind! I sensed where you are before you answered
I'll send you a tutorial.
That's okay, I'll just go you and you can show me how
I just sensed where you are so I'm coming now

options.text: That ability of yours is awesome…

messages.text: That ability of yours is better than GPS...
Anyway, go ahead. I'm free anyway.
Hehe, I'll be there soon, just hang on
naerxun
Commander, where are you?
I bought some ice cream and I wanted to share, but I can't find you

options.text: I'm right where I've been the whole time.

messages.text: What do you mean? I haven't gone anywhere.
I'm in the lounge room of building 1.
Wait, so did I get lost then?
Yeah, I'm definitely lost... The fishies here look different

options.text: Are there any landmarks around you?

messages.text: Maybe you got lost?
Let me have a look around
Oh, you're right!
The fishies here look different from usual

options.text: Are there any landmarks around you?

messages.text: Are there any landmarks around you?
There's a sign that says "building 2"

options.text: Can you find your way back to building 1?

messages.text: Can you find your way back to building 1?
I'll use my ability and see...
No, the fishies are too loud and I can't hear the sound of your voice
Actually, wait, the fishies just told me where you are!
Stay right here
I'll make my way there right now!
Alright, stay put. I'll come pick you up.
Okay, thank you
I could just use my ability to locate you immediately...
But trusting you and just waiting here sounds pretty nice too
Are you sleeping, Commander?
I can hear you... you're still awake, aren't you?
Good evening.
Good evening!
Good morning.
Um... good morning, I guess?
Can't sleep?
Yeah, kind of
I can't stop thinking about tomorrow's camping trip
I've never gone camping before so I don't know what it's like
But I do know that you'll be there with me
That just makes me so excited, you know...
I've been in bed for an hour now but I'm not sleepy at all

options.text: Then let's chat until you feel tired.
Wanna try something that'll put you right to sleep?

messages.text: Then let's chat until you feel tired.
But I don't wanna keep you up

options.text: It's fine. I'm still not tired.
I don't mind. I just want to be with you.

messages.text: It's fine. I'm still not tired.
Hehe, okay, then let's talk a bit
I wonder if there's secret treasure near the campsite
If there is, I wonder what kind of treasure it is
What do you think?
I don't mind. I just want to be with you.
I wanna be with you too!
Since you're already awake, can I come to your place?
Please prepare a pillow for me!
Wanna try something that'll put you right to sleep?
Sure, how?

options.text: How about I tell you a bedtime story?
What do you say to some comfy music?

messages.text: How about I tell you a bedtime story?
That sounds fun!
But I wanna hear you read it to me, not just send it in messages
Since you're already awake, can I come to your place?
Please prepare a pillow for me!
What do you say to some comfy music?
I already tried that, it didn't really do anything
I just can't stop thinking about you...
And the thoughts just make me wanna see you so much
I wish it was tomorrow already...
